Text: You too have a great weekend! Well, it's difficult to start watching a new soap, even more when your favorite one has just been cancelled, but if it goes on like this, in 2 years time there'll be no soaps left!

It sucks oltl and amc are  going.  I got into the bold and the beautiful 4 years ago cos i love Jack Wagner and i went to see him at Mohegan sun casino you wont have a hard time getting into that one its one of my favs.  Thanks again claudia for the uploads.
